title: Omelette
instructions: Mix eggs and milk, pour into a hot pan with veggies and cheese, fold.

title: Fruit Salad
instructions: Slice strawberries, chop bananas, mix with blueberries, and drizzle with honey.

title: Pizza
instructions: Roll out dough, add sauce, cheese, and toppings, bake until crust is golden brown.

title: Pancakes
instructions: Mix ingredients, cook on a griddle until golden brown.

title: Fruit Smoothie
instructions: Blend fruits, yogurt, and honey until smooth.

title: Mashed Potatoes
instructions: Boil potatoes, mash with butter, milk, salt, and pepper.
